long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Air Note is a simple notebook that lives inside your Google Chrome browser.

There is no need to open a new note application. Simply open a new tab in the Chrome browser you are already using and jot down ideas as they occur to you.
